result.html: Bhuail eagla íShe was seized by fear.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail eagla íShe was seized by fear.

result.eng: The road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ga: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.orig: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.html: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ponchtml: Dúnaḋ an bóṫar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.

result.eng: Those of you who fear God.
result.ga: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla Dé
result.orig: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla Dé
result.html: Sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla DéThose of you who fear God.
result.ponchtml: Siḃse ar a ḃfuil eagla DéThose of you who fear God.

result.eng: We built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ga: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.orig: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúirí
result.html: Thógamar claíthe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saighdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.
result.ponchtml: Ṫógamar claíṫe ar eagla ionsaí ó na saiġdiúiríWe built fences for fear of attack from the soldiers.

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ga: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obair
result.orig: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obair
result.html: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ponchtml: Ní ligfeaḋ an eagla do Ṡéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
